parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: Client API Key

parameters.name: client-id
parameters.description: Client Id. Each client will be provided with a clientId and an API Key

parameters.name: externalAccountProfileId
parameters.description: Allows to get the recommendations for a given profile account / profile.It must came in the form of externalacoount$$$externalprofile

parameters.name: profileCountry
parameters.description: Filter recommendations by country

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Filter recommendations by device type

parameters.name: mediaEventType
parameters.description: Media Event Type in the Client System

parameters.name: mediaContentProviderId
parameters.description: Content Provider Id to filter by

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of users returned. Max 50

parameters.name: exclusivePageStart
parameters.description: From where to start reading

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Recommendations that include these tags. Tag values must follow this syntax: tagname:value[,tagname1:value1|tagname2:value2...]. When expression ar concatenated by a comma (,) it's like a logical AND, if are concatenated by a pipe (|) it's a logical OR

parameters.name: programType
parameters.description: Content type to be queried. Valid options are 'Series' or 'Movies'

get.description: List the recommendations associated with a user profile
